data.name: Old Man Logan
data.description: After a tragic attack on the X-Mansion, Logan vows to put his claws away forever. But fifty years later, a cross country road trip involving gangs, dinosaurs and cannibals teaches him some vows are meant to be broken.

starItems.name: Old Man Logan
starItems.description: After a tragic attack on the X-Mansion, Logan vows to put his claws away forever. But fifty years later, a cross country road trip involving gangs, dinosaurs and cannibals teaches him some vows are meant to be broken.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>20%</color> Drain.
If this character has <color=#ED1C24>Claws Out</color>, instead, attack primary target for <color=#86e619>80%</color> Piercing + <color=#86e619>20%</color> Drain.

Fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>5%</color>.

If this character has <color=#ED1C24>Claws Out</color>, this attack cannot be dodged or blocked.

item.name: Gold
item.description: Gold is required to upgrade your character's level, abilities, and Star rank. Earn Gold in Campaign missions and Challenges.

8.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>100%</color> Drain + apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color>.
If this character has <color=#ED1C24>Claws Out</color>, instead, attack primary target for <color=#86e619>300%</color> Piercing + <color=#86e619>100%</color> Drain + apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> for <color=#86e619>1</color> turn and <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, if this character has <color=#ED1C24>Claws Out</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.

On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, gain <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>.

Generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ultimate Ability Energy for self + fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>20%</color>.

If this character has <color=#ED1C24>Claws Out</color>, this attack cannot be dodged or blocked.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage.
Chain to <color=#86e619>2</color> targets within <color=#86e619>2</color> spaces of the previous target for <color=#86e619>50%</color> damage.

If this character has <color=#ED1C24>Claws Out</color>:
 > Instead, attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> Piercing.
 > Instead, Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>5</color> targets within <color=#86e619>2</color> spaces of the previous target for <color=#86e619>50%</color> Piercing.

Gain <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>.
Generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ultimate Ability Energy for self.

This attack cannot be counterattacked.
If this character has <color=#ED1C24>Claws Out</color>, this attack cannot be dodged or blocked.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Gain <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> and <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color>

2.description:

 > Instead, attack primary target for <color=#86e619>130%</color> Piercing.
 > Instead, Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>5</color> targets within <color=#86e619>2</color> spaces of the previous target for <color=#86e619>80%</color> Piercing.

Gain <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>, <color=#fff568>Immunity</color>, and <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color>.
Generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ultimate Ability Energy for self.

This attack cannot be counterattacked.
If this character has <color=#ED1C24>Claws Out</color>, this attack cannot be dodged or blocked.
2.nextUpgrade:

While <color=#ED1C24>Claws Out</color>, Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>6</color> targets

This attack gains +<color=#86e619>1,000%</color> Extra Focus against <color=#fff568>CHARGEABLE</color> <color=#fff568>PROTECTOR</color> enemies

Chain to <color=#86e619>4</color> targets within <color=#86e619>2</color> spaces of the previous target for <color=#86e619>220%</color> damage.

If this character has <color=#ED1C24>Claws Out</color>:

Gain <color=#fff568>Revive Once</color>

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>420%</color> damage + flip all positive effects into negative effects + apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color>.
Chain to <color=#86e619>4</color> targets within <color=#86e619>2</color> spaces of the previous target for <color=#86e619>350%</color> damage + flip all  positive effects into negative effects.

If this character has <color=#ED1C24>Claws Out</color>:
 > Instead, attack primary target for <color=#86e619>420%</color> Piercing + flip all positive effects into negative effects + apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> and <color=#fff568>Trauma</color>.
 > Instead, Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>7</color> targets within <color=#86e619>2</color> spaces of the previous target for <color=#86e619>350%</color> Piercing + flip all  positive effects into negative effects + apply <color=#fff568>Trauma</color>.

Gain <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>, <color=#fff568>Immunity</color>, and <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color>.

This attack gains +<color=#86e619>1,000%</color> Extra Focus against <color=#fff568>CHARGEABLE</color> <color=#fff568>PROTECTOR</color> enemies.
This attack cannot be counterattacked.
If this character has <color=#ED1C24>Claws Out</color>, this attack cannot be dodged or blocked.

item.name: Gold
item.description: Gold is required to upgrade your character's level, abilities, and Star rank. Earn Gold in Campaign missions and Challenges.

8.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>420%</color> damage + flip all positive effects into negative effects + apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color>.

If this character has <color=#ED1C24>Claws Out</color>:
 > Instead, attack primary target for <color=#86e619>420%</color> Piercing + flip all positive effects into negative effects + apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> and <color=#fff568>Trauma</color>.
 > Instead, Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>7</color> targets within <color=#86e619>2</color> spaces of the previous target for <color=#86e619>350%</color> Piercing + flip all  positive effects into negative effects + apply <color=#fff568>Trauma</color>.

Generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ultimate Ability Energy for self.

Apply <color=#fff568>Revive Once</color> to self and a random Daken ally (This will have no effect for any of these characters that already have <color=#fff568>Revive Once</color>).

This attack gains +<color=#86e619>1,000%</color> Extra Focus against <color=#fff568>CHARGEABLE</color> <color=#fff568>PROTECTOR</color> enemies.
This attack cannot be counterattacked.
If this character has <color=#ED1C24>Claws Out</color>, this attack cannot be dodged or blocked.

Gain <color=#ED1C24>Claws Out</color>.

Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>190%</color> Piercing + <color=#86e619>50%</color> Drain + flip <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects into negative effects + apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
Apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to the enemy with the highest Damage.

This attack ignores <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> and cannot be counterattacked, dodged, or blocked.

item.name: Gold
item.description: Gold is required to upgrade your character's level, abilities, and Star rank. Earn Gold in Campaign missions and Challenges.

8.description:
Gain <color=#ED1C24>Claws Out</color>.

Clear Barrier on all enemies.
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>550%</color> Piercing + <color=#86e619>100%</color> Drain + flip all positive effects into negative effects + apply all of the following negative effects for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns: <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>, <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>, <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color>, <color=#fff568>Trauma</color>.

Apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to the enemy with the highest Damage.

Generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Special Ability Energy for self.
On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Special Ability Energy for <color=#86e619>2</color> random <color=#fff568>MUTANT</color> allies that were not at full energy on start of the current turn.

This attack ignores <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> and cannot be counterattacked, dodged, or blocked.

1.description:
On Turn, clear all negative effects on this character + heal self for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of Max Health + <color=#86e619>15%</color> of Max Health per negative effect removed.

When this character's Health is above <color=#86e619>50%</color>, <color=#fff568>Stun</color> cannot be applied to this character and their Speed Bar cannot be reduced.

While any enemy has <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>:
 > Lower that character's Damage by <color=#86e619>30%</color>. This will not stack with other effects, such as <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>.
 > Lower that character's Resistance by <color=#86e619>50%</color>.
 > <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> cannot be applied to self or any <color=#fff568>MERCS FOR MONEY</color> allies.
